title: 2021 Saracen: Ariel platform overhauled w/ five new bikes including Ariel Junior & eMTB
content:
British mountain bike manufacturers Saracen have relaunched as a direct to consumer brand, overhauling the Ariel platform in the process with five new full suspension mountain bikes. The range now includes 130mm, 160mm and 180mm travel options, a 150mm travel eMTB and an Ariel Junior for your little rippers. Here’s a brief introduction to the […]
